<< The only thing I didn't like about the Pretenders was that they only 
 moved at the shoulder. they wouldve been more oopular if they were a 
 little bigger and moved at the elbows, hips, knees, and maybe even 
 the neck. >>

I really don't mean to be bossy, coming back from vacation and starting to be 
an A-Hole, but could you people stop with these e-mails?  This is an RPG.  
Not an e-mail group that talks about old toys.  So please, stop.  Unless it's 
about Unicron or the USSR.  Or voice actors from TF.  Or any other cool 
cartoons.  Pokemon is not a cool show by the way.
